inscription.text: Even in the Hottest Climate - Boils Go! without danger of further septic infection

Lion is a very soothing and healing Ointment, used and approved in the home country for more than 90 years. But it's more than that. It's a safeguard - against spread of septic infection, especially in hot climates where germ infections spread so rapidly. The first application isolates the poison. Then, surely, it brings the poison out, and forms a clean, new healthy skin in the natural way.

In a few days, Boils go, inflammation goes, danger of blood poisoning ended! Perfectly safe, even for infants. No medicine cupboard should be without it. Boils Carbuncles, Septic Wounds, Abscesses, Eczema, Cuts, Burns, Bites, Stings.

From Chemists and Druggists in most parts of the world, at popular prices. English prices 1/3, 3/- & 5/- per box. In case of difficulty send M.O. to - Edwin Burgess Ltd., 59, Gray's Inn Road, London, England. Burgess' Lion Ointment.
Distributors for India: Bombay: P.M. Zaveri & Co. Madon, Sons & Co., Ltd. Calcutta: Paul, Butto Kristo & Co., Ltd. Frank Ross & Co., Ltd. Madras: Spencer & Co. Ltd. Rangoon: E.M. de Souza & Co.
